game.name: Castle Crashers - Pink Knight Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Born out of popular demand, rumor, and Tom Fulp’s Beard, the Pink Knight is ready to bring the love in. Add the playable Pink Knight plus 5 additional weapons.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Born out of popular demand, rumor, and Tom Fulp’s Beard, the Pink Knight is ready to bring the love in. Add the playable Pink Knight plus 5 additional weapons.
